claims.claim: Humana received over one million calls per month from providers, mostly routine inquiries that could have been resolved through Interactive voice response (IVR) without human intervention
claims.quote: The company received over one million calls per month from providers, mostly routine inquiries that could have been resolved through Interactive voice response (IVR) without human intervention.
